title: tomcc: 将解决实体消失问题

txt_content:

原文：think I found the solution to entity despawn boys! And it turns out it was my fault. Oops! Hopefully it will be in 1.0.5!

译文：我认为我找到解决实体消失的办法了，结果发现这是我的锅。一样1.0.5中能修复它。
